sentence.Network_en: The most adulterous countries in the world are African.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from the obsolete noun adulter 'adulterer' (see adultery) + -ous

entry.def: An adulterous relationship is a sexual relationship between a married person and someone they are not married to. An adulterous person is someone who commits adultery.

sentences.sentence: "the extracurricular activities of a philandering husband"

means.word_mean: 2. not faithful to a spouse or lover;
